subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson chipped in from 35 feet on the 18th hole at Riviera for a five-under-par 66, giving him a one-shot lead in the opening round of the Northern Trust Open in Los Angeles.
snippet: Phil Mickelson chipped in from 35 feet on the 18th hole at Riviera for a five-under-par 66, giving him a one-shot lead in the opening round of the Northern Trust Open in Los Angeles.
